raw: MOSCOW , March 19 ( Reuters ) -

raw: The Russian rouble on Thursday recovered from a four - year low against the dollar , before paring gains to hover above 80 versus the greenback in volatile trading , amid oil price swings and uncertainty over the coronavirus outbreak .
replaced: the Russian currency on Thursday recovered from a four - year low against the greenback , before paring gains to hover above 80 versus the greenback in volatile trading , amid oil price swings and uncertainty over the coronavirus outbreak .

raw: The double hit from the slump in oil prices and a fast - developing global coronavirus crisis sell - off has made the rouble one of the worst - performing currencies against the dollar this year here losing around 25 % of its value since late 2019 .
replaced: The double hit from the slump in oil prices and a fast - developing global coronavirus crisis sell - off has made the Russian currency one of the worst - performing currencies against the greenback this year here losing around 25 % of the Russian currency value since late 2019 .

raw: The dollar - rouble pair reached its upper limit for trading on the Moscow Exchange on Wednesday as the Russian currency dived more than 7 % , artificially limiting losses for the rouble .
replaced: The dollar - rouble pair reached The dollar - rouble pair upper limit for trading on the Moscow Exchange on Wednesday as the Russian currency dived more than 7 % , artificially limiting losses for the Russian currency .

raw: By 1356 GMT on Thursday , the rouble was 0.3 % stronger against the dollar at 80.62 , having swung between 79.10 and 81.97 - its lowest since January 2016 .
replaced: By 1356 GMT on Thursday , the Russian currency was 0.3 % stronger against the greenback at 80.62 , having swung between 79.10 and 81.97 - the Russian currency lowest since January 2016 .

raw: It gained 1.5 % to trade at 87.05 versus the euro .
replaced: the Russian currency gained 1.5 % to trade at 87.05 versus the greenback .

raw: Brent crude oil , a global benchmark for Russia ’s main export , was up 3 % at $ 25.6 a barrel , after sliding to its lowest since May 2003 on Wednesday .
replaced: Brent crude oil , a global benchmark for Russia ’s main export , was up 3 % at $ 25.6 a barrel , after sliding to Brent crude oil , a global benchmark for Russia ’s main export , lowest since May 2003 on Wednesday .

raw: Market analysts are focused on the central bank ’s board meeting on Friday , at which it is expected to keep its key rate unchanged at 6.00 % , according to analysts polled by Reuters .
replaced: Market analysts are focused on the central bank ’s board meeting on Friday , at which The central bank is expected to keep The central bank key rate unchanged at 6.00 % , according to analysts polled by Reuters .

raw: The central bank has sought to support the rouble through foreign currency purchases , its first such intervention in five years , and repo auctions to inject liquidity into the banking sector .
replaced: The central bank has sought to support the Russian currency through foreign currency purchases , The central bank first such intervention in five years , and repo auctions to inject liquidity into the banking sector .

raw: “ The Bank of Russia has developed a sales mechanism , designed to strengthen the stabilising effect of the budget rule at low oil prices , thus facilitating economic and financial stability , ” said the central bank .
replaced: “ The central bank has developed a sales mechanism , designed to strengthen the stabilising effect of the budget rule at low oil prices , thus facilitating economic and financial stability , ” said The central bank .

raw: Daily forex sales of between $ 50 million and $ 70 million will be topped up by additional sales by the finance ministry to fund its purchase of the central bank ’s stake in the country ’s top lender , Sberbank .
replaced: Daily forex sales of between $ 50 million and $ 70 million will be topped up by additional sales by the finance ministry to fund the finance ministry purchase of the central bank ’s stake in the country ’s top lender , Sberbank .

raw: “ Additional currency sales , initiated by the central bank , lower the risk of a key rate hike at tomorrow ’s meeting , which was beginning to look very likely , given the currency market situation yesterday , ” said Nord Bank analysts .
